features: Don't Wash Away Your Color; Our Color Fresh Conditioner is infused with Kumquat Extract to bring shine and vitality to natural and color treated hair, and Sunflower Seed Extract to protect hair color against UV color fading
Restore And Nourish; Our hydrating conditioner adds shine and vitality without weighing hair down; Keep your hair color looking like you just left the salon
Gentle And Effective; dpHUE Color Fresh Conditioner gently nourishes, leaving hair feeling soft, shiny and healthy without stripping color; No Parabens, Sulfates, Phthalates, Gluten, Silicone
Healthy Hair Everyday; dpHUE’s color safe conditioners can be used weekly or as often as needed; Animal-friendly, Vegan, and made in the USA
Meet Your New Favorite Conditioner; Whether you’re blonde, brunette or uniquely bold, we’re confident you just found your go-to conditioner for color treated hair

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Don’t Wash Away Your Color Love your color? Keep it looking it’s best and reduce color fade with Color Fresh. Color Fresh Shampoo gently cleanses impurities, leaving hair soft, shiny and healthy while Color Fresh Conditioner restores and nourishes, without weighing hair down. Color safe and formulated for all hair colors and hair types. Fresh Ingredients Color Fresh Shampoo and Conditioner contain Kumquat Extract to bring shine and vitality to natural and color treated hair as well as Sunﬂower Seed Extract to reduce color fade and protect from UV damage. Our Leaping Bunny Certified Color Fresh Oil Therapy is a weightless, clear hair oil that won’t tint or dull your color. Style Without Fading Color Color Fresh Styling products are lightweight, clear, and use water-soluble ingredients to avoid color shifting and product build up. They also provide heat and UV protection to prevent color fading.

Touchable Hairspray Thermal Protection Spray Dry Texture Spray Leave-In Mist Texturizing Powder Best For All hair colors and hair types All hair colors and hair types All hair colors and hair types All hair colors and hair types All hair colors and hair types Benefits A soft hold, non-sticky hairspray that adds shine & color vitality, fights frizz, and provides heat, humidity, and color protection. Protects hair and color against the damaging effect of hot tools & intense heat, fights frizz, and helps smooth, hydrate & provide shine. ​ Refreshes, volumizes, provides a soft hold, and shields from color dulling & UV color fading Hydrates, detangles, provides heat protection & helps prevent color from fading & dulling Delivers an instant lift at the roots and adds texture throughout hair length for fuller, voluminous styles Size 8 oz 5 oz 5 oz 6.5 oz 0.3 oz Vegan ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Leaping Bunny Certified ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓
Leaping Bunny Certified by the Coalition of Consumer Information on Cosmetics for adopting the Corporate Standard of Compassion for Animals. Valid until 11/9/2024.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this product for quite some time now and I have to say it is my go to. It leaves your hair feeling super soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this conditioner!
reviews.reviewText: A little goes a long way and the scent is really nice (not too strong). My hair felt silkier and healthier after the first time I used it. In fact I got compliments on my hair from strangers! I would highly recommend this conditioner, and love that it will make my highlights last longer too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Leaves hair soft and smooth but doesn’t weigh down

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2020
reviews.reviewText: The scent is very mild and nice thick product. I have longer hair and I can use a small amount. Little bit pricey tho.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Opened and Used???
reviews.reviewText: This is my holy grail conditioner—it is perfect for weighing down fine, frizzy hair if you don’t rinse most of it out. But the first one of these I ordered arrived opened and missing some of the product, so I asked for a replacement. That second tube also had no safety seal and didn’t seem to contain the amount of product I’m used to. Also, it had an old-school price tag on it like it came from a shop? The third time, I ordered the brightening version of this conditioner, and that tube was sealed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Moisturizing but not heavy conditioner for Color Treated hair
reviews.reviewText: This is the best shampoo for color treated hair. I love the fresh scent and simple packaging. I use a number of DP Hue products and the shampoo and conditioner are my favorite.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Enriches hues of color treated hair.
reviews.reviewText: Works well for color treated hair. Leaves hair with soft smooth finish

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome for hair
reviews.reviewText: Love how this makes my hair feel. Soft and full.
